summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 41st Avenue North, 42nd Avenue North and 43rd Avenue North, each from East Madison Street to McGilvra Street; East Newton Street, East Lynn Street and McGlivra Street, each from 41st Avenue North to 43rd Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 72851, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
